sentences.en: An advanced model, the Nike - Zeus, is designed to intercept invading missiles.
sentences.cn: 一种先进模式的“奈克Ⅲ式”导弹被设计用于截击入侵导弹.

sentences.en: an attempt to intercept drugs being smuggled over the border
sentences.cn: 阻截毒品走私入境的努力

sentences.en: Camby is still there and is always trying to intercept the shots.
sentences.cn: 这一场,坎比还在那儿,试图封盖.

sentences.en: Continue the heading to intercept localizer, cleared for ILS approach.
sentences.cn: 继续这一航向切入航道, 允许盲降进入.

sentences.en: Gunmen intercepted him on his way to the airport.
sentences.cn: 持枪人在他去机场的路上截住了他。

sentences.en: Heavy vegetation may intercept a large amount of precipitation on its leaves.
sentences.cn: 浓密的植被的叶子中能截留大量的降水.

sentences.en: Intercept will now cause damage to targets that are immune to stun.
sentences.cn: 即使目标免疫昏迷,拦截也会对其造成伤害.

sentences.en: It is illegal to intercept a letter or parcel before it is delivered.
sentences.cn: 在送达之前，中途拦截信件或包裹是非法的。

sentences.en: It is illegal to intercept radio messages.
sentences.cn: 拦截无线电报是非法的。

sentences.en: Our troops are going to intercept the enemy at the mountain pass.
sentences.cn: 我军将在这个山口要击敌人.

sentences.en: Regression estimates : including intercept and coefficients for linear, quadratic and correlation coefficient.
sentences.cn: 2?归参数: 含截距 、 一次、二次?归参数与相关系数.

sentences.en: The camera is then placed to intercept the desired rays.
sentences.cn: 这时即可放置照相机去接收所要的光线.

sentences.en: The Sentinels circling the dome to intercept the new threat.
sentences.cn: 哨兵围绕着圆屋顶拦截新的威胁.

sentences.en: To study relationship area under ROC curve with intercept and slope.
sentences.cn: 目的探索roc曲线 下面积与roc曲线 在ND轴上的截距、斜率的关系.

sentences.en: To take or intercept the impact of ( a blow, for example ).
sentences.cn: 接受或拦截 ( 例如一拳 ) 的冲击.

sentences.en: Write a VB source to intercept anti - WINDOWS shutdown shutdown process!
sentences.cn: 写VB的源拦截 反 窗口关闭关机过程!

sentences.en: Yuke Landing Force Fighter squadron, turn to intercept them.
sentences.cn: 战斗机中队, 转去迎击敌人.

words.tran_cn: 拦截，截住；截断，截取；侦听，窃听

trans.tran_cn: （数学）截距，截击，拦截，截听，拦截者

trans.tran_en: to stop something or someone that is going from one place to another before they get there

trans.tran_cn: 拦截，拦住，截球，截击，拦阻
trans.tran_en: to stop something or someone that is going from one place to another before they get there
